document_name: National ecological transition strategy towards sustainable development
document_description: This document defines a vision for sustainable development to 2020, to transform the socioeconomic model of growth, and to favour the appropriation of this transition by everyone. It is based on the following axes:Â Develop sustainable and resilient territoriesEngage in the circular and low-carbon economyPrevent and reduce environmental, social and territorial inequalitiesInventing new economic and financial modelsSupport the ecological transformation of economic activitiesOrient the production of knowledge, research and innovation towards ecological transitionEducate, train and raise awareness for ecological transition and sustainable developmentMobilise stakeholders at all levelsPromote sustainable development at European and international level
